root.thinking: Novice Python programmers commonly incorrectly indent their code, so the line can be incorrectly indented. Since novices also commonly mismatch their brackets and quotation marks when programming, two more syntax errors can be added that relate to these common mistakes.
root.explanation: Incorrectly indented line 1. Changed the closing quotation mark and bracket to mismatch with the opening ones, each adding another syntax error.
